```{r setup, include=FALSE} ## Name the cell, and do not include it in the rendering
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Introduction

This is a basic RMarkdown document.

We can edit text and execute R code :

```{r}
summary(cars)
```

## Graphiques

We can also easily add graphics :

```{r}
plot(pressure)
```
